Package de.fhe.ai.model

Class PassengerTram

java.lang.Object
de.fhe.ai.model.ModelBase
de.fhe.ai.model.Tram
de.fhe.ai.model.PassengerTram
public class PassengerTram
extends Tram
A class that represents Tram for passenger transport

  • Constructor Details

    • PassengerTram

      public PassengerTram​(int id, EventManager eventManager, TrafficManager trafficManager, int maxPassengers, int weight, int speed, java.lang.String tramType)
      Initializes a new passenger Tram
      Parameters:
      id - the internal id of the tram
      eventManager - the eventManager used to communicate with the TrafficManager, must be non-null
      maxPassengers - the maximum capacity of passengers of the tram, must be a positive integer
      weight - the total weight of the tram excluding passengers in kg, must be a positive integer
      speed - the speed the tram will move at in km/h, must be a positive integer
      tramType - the type identifier of the tram, must be non-null and not empty
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if invalid parameters are passed

  • Method Details

    • getMaxPassengers

      public int getMaxPassengers()

    • getCurrentPassengers

      public int getCurrentPassengers()

    • setCurrentPassengers

      public void setCurrentPassengers​(int passengers)
      Attempts to set the current amount of passengers to the given number
      Parameters:
      passengers - the amount to set the current amount of passengers to, must be between 0 and maxPassengers
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given amount not between 0 and maxPassengers

    • addPassengers

      public void addPassengers​(int passengers)
      Attempts to add the given number of passengers to the given tram
      Parameters:
      passengers - the amount of passengers to add to the tram
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if it is attempted to add passengers while the tram is on a connection
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if it is attempted to add passengers past the maximum allowed passengers

    • removePassengers

      public void removePassengers​(int passengers)
      Attempts to remove the given number of passengers from the given tram
      Parameters:
      passengers - the amount of passengers to remove from the tram
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if it is attempted to remove passengers while the tram is on a connection
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if it is attempted to remove more passengers than there are in the tram
